## Shape.Fill property

Returns a FillFormat object that contains fill formatting properties for the specified shape.

```csharp
public FillFormat Fill { get; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
Aspose.Cells.Drawing.FillFormat fillFmt = shape.Fill;
```
